page.title: 11LADRAM BAY (I)
page.content: Ladram Bay is 1 km from Otterton.It is situated between Budleigh Salterton and Sidmouth. It is a{holiday {camp,}with caravans, tents, a pub,swimming pool, shops and adventure playground.The beach is a stoney beach sourounded by red sandstone cliffs.The land is owned by Mr.Carter who lives at{Sea View Farm. Mr.Michael Edwards runs the shops and has seven shop assistants.He sells about ten thousand ice creams and ice lollys each season.He also sells groceries,swimming gear and anything you really want. {The South Devon Coastal Footpath runs along the cliff tops in this area There are splendid views for many miles along the coast in each direction in clear weather. On the beach there are rock-pools containing many kinds of marine life.
